channel.title: Luke's Linkblog
channel.description: A linkblog about all kinds of topics including SEO, AI, music, life, and the Web.

item.title: What the Fuck Should I Make For Dinner
item.description: What the fuck should you make for dinner? We will provide your indecisive self with some ideas.
item.content:encoded: What the fuck should you make for dinner? We will provide your indecisive self with some ideas.

item.title: Password Strength Estimator
item.description: Password Strength Estimator estimates how strong your password is based on how long it'd take to crack by online and offline attacks (throttled and unthrottled)
item.content:encoded: Password Strength Estimator estimates how strong your password is based on how long it'd take to crack by online and offline attacks (throttled and unthrottled)

item.title: City In A Bottle – A 256 Byte Raycasting System
item.description: This amazing program uses many different concepts in a very small space, understanding it is kind of like solving a puzzle. There are several main pieces including the html code, frame update loop, rendering system, raycasting engine, and the city itself.
item.content:encoded: This amazing program uses many different concepts in a very small space, understanding it is kind of like solving a puzzle. There are several main pieces including the html code, frame update loop, rendering system, raycasting engine, and the city itself.

item.title: Billion laughs attack
item.description: In computer security, a billion laughs attack is a type of denial-of-service (DoS) attack which is aimed at parsers of XML documents. It is also referred to as an XML bomb or as an exponential entity expansion attack.
item.content:encoded: In computer security, a billion laughs attack is a type of denial-of-service (DoS) attack which is aimed at parsers of XML documents. It is also referred to as an XML bomb or as an exponential entity expansion attack.

item.title: Solving x^3=8
item.description: Solving x^3=8 and the answer is not just 2. We will need to factor a difference of 2 cubes, use the quadratic formula and imaginary number.
item.content:encoded: Solving x^3=8 and the answer is not just 2. We will need to factor a difference of 2 cubes, use the quadratic formula and imaginary number.

item.title: America, My Face Is Saying Everything That You Need To Know
item.description: The title is saying everything that you need to know
item.content:encoded: The title is saying everything that you need to know

item.title: The Problem with the FizzBuzz Problem
item.description: FizzBuzz is not the basic, sanity-check interview question that many presume it to be. Use it and you might just end up filtering out some of your good candidates who, unfortunately, suffer from the Smart Person's Mirage.
item.content:encoded: FizzBuzz is not the basic, sanity-check interview question that many presume it to be. Use it and you might just end up filtering out some of your good candidates who, unfortunately, suffer from the Smart Person's Mirage.

item.title: Dwitter - javascript demos in 140 characters
item.description: Dwitter is a social network for building and sharing visual javascript demos limited to 140 characters.
item.content:encoded: Dwitter is a social network for building and sharing visual javascript demos limited to 140 characters.

item.title: faces.js
item.description: A JavaScript library for generating vector-based cartoon faces
item.content:encoded: A JavaScript library for generating vector-based cartoon faces

item.title: How the SP-404 Came to Dominate the Global Beat Scene
item.description: Given the meteoric rise in popularity the 404 has experienced over the past five to 10 years, it's worth asking the question: How did this sampler become such a global phenomenon, despite modest initial commercial success and a relatively slow adoption from the producer community?
item.content:encoded: Given the meteoric rise in popularity the 404 has experienced over the past five to 10 years, it's worth asking the question: How did this sampler become such a global phenomenon, despite modest initial commercial success and a relatively slow adoption from the producer community?

item.title: Searching for Tomorrow: The Story of Madlib and DOOM's Madvillainy
item.description: Following the 10th anniversary of Madlib and DOOM's telepathic mind meld of an album, Jeff Weiss traces the history of Madvillain and details how these two perpetually mystifying artists came together for an uncanny hip-hop classic.
item.content:encoded: Following the 10th anniversary of Madlib and DOOM's telepathic mind meld of an album, Jeff Weiss traces the history of Madvillain and details how these two perpetually mystifying artists came together for an uncanny hip-hop classic.

item.title: Everything I needed to know about writing, I learned from “Paid In Full”
item.description: Nearly twenty-eight years after its release, the album offers the best look at the lives of writers
item.content:encoded: Nearly twenty-eight years after its release, the album offers the best look at the lives of writers

item.title: Why does HTML think “chucknorris” is a color?
item.description: A fascinating rabbit hole involving CSS, colours, and random words.
item.content:encoded: A fascinating rabbit hole involving CSS, colours, and random words.

item.title: Infinite Craft
item.description: A super addictive game where you craft a variety of things by combining the four elements (earth, wind, fire, and water). Created by Neal Agarwal using a large language model called Llama 2
item.content:encoded: A super addictive game where you craft a variety of things by combining the four elements (earth, wind, fire, and water). Created by Neal Agarwal using a large language model called Llama 2

item.title: 'Golfballia ambusta' and the tale of a fungus hoax
item.description: How three burnt golf balls gave mycology a 'Dada moment' and possibly an existential crisis.
item.content:encoded: How three burnt golf balls gave mycology a 'Dada moment' and possibly an existential crisis.

item.title: Please, don’t force me to log in
item.description: Juha-Matti Santala points out a lot of services needing account logins for arbitrary reasons.
item.content:encoded: Juha-Matti Santala points out a lot of services needing account logins for arbitrary reasons.

item.title: 1967 NFL Championship Game
item.description: Because of the adverse conditions in which the game was played, the rivalry between the two teams, and the game's dramatic climax, it has been immortalized as the Ice Bowl
item.content:encoded: Because of the adverse conditions in which the game was played, the rivalry between the two teams, and the game's dramatic climax, it has been immortalized as the Ice Bowl
